title: My Client Stopped Working Entirely. (Help Please)
body:
every time I press launch, it says: PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working. 

I've just uninstalled and re-downloaded the client, but the same issue is still occurring. Apart from that I don't really know what else to try. Could anyone please help me?

replies.body: thank you very much. It's weird because I was just playing a week ago with no problems. Thanks again!

Anytime you see that kernel error, it's a pretty good sign that your OS is blocking league from launching. Your pc needs to have certain permissions in place before it lets some programs run, and without that your OS will shut down the program every time. 

Go over our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), and you should be able to get all those permissions in place!
